name: The Firelight
text:
2+ FIRE monsters including a "Firelight" Summoned from the Extra Deck
This card gains additional effects based on cards face-up on the field.
- Firelight First Seal: Unaffected by your opponent's monster effects.
- Firelight Second Seal: Unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap effects.
- Firelight Third Seal: This card cannot be Tributed.
- Firelight FINAL Seal: If your opponent Summons a monster to a zone this card points to: banish all cards your opponent controls.
